item.title: What got this dog woofing and barking at servers
item.author: maddi@puppygirl.io (Maddi)
item.description: So you&rsquo;re still confused as to what the purpose of this whole site is. Well let me try to maybe explain it a bit. Frist, hi! I&rsquo;m Maddi. I am a total nerd when it comes to computers and technology as a whole. I have such an immense fascination with it that I have spent a majority of my life learning as much as I can about how things work.

item.title: What Is A Therian?
item.author: maddi@puppygirl.io (Maddi)
item.description: # So what is exactly is a &ldquo;Therian&rdquo;? More specifically what is therianthropy? And what is a therianthrope? Well according to the Therian Wiki The noun/term &rsquo;therianthropy&rsquo; is used to refer to the intrinsic experience surrounding someone&rsquo;s therian identity. It is the term used to encapsulate the broader experience, while the term &rsquo;therianthrope&rsquo; (someone who involuntarily identifies as a non-human animalistic creature) refers to the individual who experiences it.

item.title: Sunshine & Moonlight
item.author: maddi@puppygirl.io (Maddi)
item.description: # awoooooooo # This is what I wrote to nate. Make this a blog post lol My desktop is connected via a 10G fiber link to the core switch. You don&rsquo;t fully need this and honestly could get away with a 1G copper link You need to ensure that the GPU/CPU can handle encoding video at whatever bitrate you&rsquo;re going to be pushing. In my case I push a full 150Mbps using AV1 (which is experimental btw, I just switched to it because HEVC looked like shit with a lot of artifacting)

item.title: Madeleine - Resume
item.author: maddi@puppygirl.io (Maddi)
item.description: # Contact Information Madeleine &ndash; maddi@puppygirl [dot] io | #### Enterprise Infrastructure | System Administration | Networking | Cloud Computing | AI Platform Expert | Home Labber # Skills ### Technical &amp; Data Center Expertise Extensive experience in data center operations, with a proven track record across diverse environments, including compute, storage, and AI. A blend of operational proficiency and strategic implementation, honed at both large corporations and through personal lab projects

item.title: Pawsitively Me
item.author: maddi@puppygirl.io (Maddi)
item.description: Hey there! I&rsquo;m Madeleine but everyone calls me Maddi (It/Its or Pup/Pups) My hobbies include playing video games, riding my motorcycle or tinkering around with my home lab. For games I usually play shooters or arcade style with friends. I pop in and out of playing MMOs as well. WoW, OSRS and some others Professionally I am a senior data center technician puppy and work helping to build some of the worlds largest facilities that house the most advanced computing platforms on the planet A little bit about me, I&rsquo;m a transgender female and a furry. I also identify as therian ΘΔ!

item.title: What's in my Home Lab
item.author: maddi@puppygirl.io (Maddi)
item.description: # My lab! All of the wacky, goofy and insanely over kill equipment and software because I find it fun! ## Before we dive in Something to know, this setup is evolving on a constant basis with new software and hardware. Some of this may be outdated. I will do my best to keep it as close to accurate as possible. Honestly though, if I did, it would probably take a ton of time with every single change. So instead, I&rsquo;m going to try and keep this relatively updated with hardware and roughly with software/services. I also will, at my own discretion, intentionally not mention some details about the configuration for the sake of security.
